ocr_pytesseract module¶

Module containing the Pytesseract OCR parameters to be performed on the _cropped jpg outputs from the segmentation_cropping.py module.

ocr_pytesseract.perform_ocr(crop_dir: str, path: str, filename: str) → None[source]¶

Perfoms Optical Character Recognition with the pytesseract python librairy on jpg images.

Parameters:

  • crop_dir (str) – path to the directory where the cropped jpgs’ main folder is saved.

  • path (str) – path to the directory where the cropped jpgs are saved.

  • out_dir_OCR (str) – path to the target directory to save the OCR outputs.

ocr_pytesseract.preprocessing(crop_dir: str, pre_path: str) → None[source]¶

Preprocesses the cropped images to standardize their quality before applying the OCR on them. Saves the preprocessed image into a new _pre folder in the main images directory.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – path to the directory where the cropped images are saved.

  • pre_path (str) – path to the target directory to save the preprocessed images.
